articles.title: LBC presenter Steve Allen to leave station after 44 years - BBC
articles.description: The radio station's longest-serving presenter Steve Allen says it's been an "honour and privilege".
articles.content:
Veteran broadcaster Steve Allen has announced he is to leave the LBC radio station after 44 years.
On Friday, the 68-year-old tweeted: "My contract with LBC is up shortly and, following discussions,… [+1265 chars]

articles.title: Ryanair hostess films 'drunk' fans singing crass chants on flight to Barcelona before Manchester United game - Manchester Evening News

articles.description: When the future Ziggy sang ‘like a constipated Bee Gee’ and was a music industry joke, Kenneth Pitt believed in him. Why was he cast aside?

articles.title: Danny Dyer checked into a psychiatric unit after making 'serious errors' in life - The Mirror
articles.description: Danny Dyer explains why he flew other to South Africa rather than check himself into The Priory, as the former EastEnders actor opens up about mental health struggles and the battles men face
articles.content:
Danny Dyer has shared how he once checked himself into a psychiatric unit, where he realised he has male abandonment issues.
